result.ga: An bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseo
result.orig: An bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseo
result.html: An bhfuil cead agam caitheamh anseoMay I smoke here?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil cead agam caiṫeaṁ anseoMay I smoke here?

result.eng: May I go to the toilet?
result.ga: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreas
result.orig: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreas
result.html: An bhfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leithreasMay I go to the toilet?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil cead agam dul go dtí an leiṫreasMay I go to the toilet?

result.ga: An dtig liom labhairt le Pádraig
result.orig: An dtig liom labhairt le Pádraig
result.html: An dtig liom labhairt le PádraigMay I speak to Patrick?
result.ponchtml: An dtig liom laḃairt le PádraigMay I speak to Patrick?

result.eng: I'd like to keep this book if I may.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach dom
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach dom
result.html: Ba mhaith liom an leabhar seo a choimeád más ceadmhach domI'd like to keep this book if I may.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom an leaḃar seo a ċoimeád más ceadṁaċ domI'd like to keep this book if I may.

result.eng: The President may be impeached for misconduct.
result.ga: Féadfar an tUachtarán a tháinseamh as ucht mí-iompair
result.orig: Féadfar an tUachtarán a tháinseamh as ucht mí-iompair
result.html: Féadfar an tUachtarán a tháinseamh as ucht mí-iompairThe President may be impeached for misconduct.
result.ponchtml: Féadfar an tUaċtarán a ṫáinseaṁ as uċt mí-iompairThe President may be impeached for misconduct.

result.ga: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agat
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agat
result.html: Seans go bhfuil an ceart agatYou may be right.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil an ceart agatYou may be right.

result.ga: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.orig: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheana
result.html: Seans go bhfuil sé seo ar eolas agaibh cheanaYou may know this already.
result.ponchtml: Seans go ḃfuil sé seo ar eolas agaiḃ ċeanaYou may know this already.

result.eng: How may of you were there?
result.ga: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí ann
result.orig: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí ann
result.html: Cá mhéad duine agaibh a bhí annHow may of you were there?
result.ponchtml: Cá ṁéad duine agaiḃ a ḃí annHow may of you were there?

result.eng: Long as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ga: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.orig: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht é
result.html: Is gairid mo shaol feasta dá fhadacht éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.
result.ponchtml: Is gairid mo ẛaol feasta dá ḟadaċt éLong as my life may have been, whatever remains of it will be short.

result.eng: We may be related but we are not alike.
result.html: Más gaolmhar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.
result.ponchtml: Más gaolṁar ní cosúilWe may be related but we are not alike.
